sentences.en: But man's soul is most awake in his knowledge of the interchangeability of the term "existence" and "transitoriness".
sentences.cn: 但是对于于“存在”与“短暂”的可互换性，只有人的大脑才能最清楚地意识到。

sentences.en: She was transitoriness just like snow.
sentences.cn: 她就像雪一样,是短暂的.

sentences.en: Without transitoriness, without beginning or end, birth or death, there is no time, either.
sentences.cn: 没有短暂，没有开始与结束、生与死，时间也就不复存在。
